entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: SSE 31 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
